translations: v.长雀斑（freckle 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Facial markings include color around one or both eyes, freckling on the muzzle and a spot on top of the head.
sentences.translation: 脸部斑纹包括了一个或两个眼睛周围，口吻上的斑点和头顶上的斑块。

sentences.sentence: And then finally the brown spots, I mean those are also first signs of aging that you see, the freckling of your face.
sentences.translation: 最后就是褐斑，我的意思是那些也是你能看到的老化的最早征兆，脸上的斑点。

sentences.sentence: And then finally the brown spots, I mean those are also first signs of aging that you see, the freckling of your face... Linda: Right.
sentences.translation: 最后就是褐斑，我的意思是那些也是你能看到的老化的最早征兆，脸上的斑点……琳达：对。
